}
 .temp-l{
     background: url(https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/fragment%3Aland-of-honey-4/construction-paper.jpg);
     width: 100%;
     line-height: 20px;
     padding: 1em;
     margin: auto;
}
* { text-transform: lowercase; }

[[span style="font-family: 'Short Stack', cursive; font-size: 20px; word-break: unset;"]]
[[div class="rotate"]]
[[div class="temp-l"]]
@@ @@
dear mother
@@ @@
may this letter reach you from this Land of Honey,
may good fortune and health forever bless you and father,
may the wind comfort your bones,
may the seas always whisper our names,
may you always remember our faces,
in rain or shine.
@@ @@
i found her.
@@ @@
we are safe.
@@ @@
